# Introduction

You can use this service to assess the air quality impacts of new developments on sensitive ecological sites.

The service will not save your work. You can export your model input files which can then be imported to continue your assessment.

When scenarios are available, the map will be displayed in the right panel.

For guidance on how to use the service, you can click on the question mark icon (<img style="width: 24px;height: 24px;display: inline-block;vertical-align: middle;margin-bottom: 4px;" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," alt="SVG Image" />) on the left-hand menu at any point during your work.

For further assistance with using the service, contact the help desk on get.a.air.pollution.
